name: Big Rigs: Over the Road Racing
name_original: Big Rigs: Over the Road Racing
description:
Big Rigs: Over the Road Racing is a racing-arcade game developed by Stellar Stone Group. It came out on 09-11-2003. GameMill Entertainment published the game. Most rawgers rated the game as "Skip".
Big Rigs: Over the Road Racing is available on PC.
Sergey Titov produced the game.
